SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling

Class Genome

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling.Genome
public class Genome extends Object
Stores all the metadata for example species of the genome, amd group the files related to the genome. For instance Fasta and Karyotype files.
Author:
franpeters
